Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text:
The meals here are really delicious. There is one version with Aubergine which tastes really good.
Hummus is pretty light and it's easy to finish a bowl by yourself without having ‚Ä¶

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: A great hummus place in De Pjip. Staff is super friendly, good service and most importantly great food. Try the hummus original and the vegan option (with spicy aubergine). Recommended.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Best place to buy real homemade hummus and the best tahin!  AL Arz Tahini, the best tahin to prepare a real homemade hummus. Also according Jigal Krant and Yotam Ottolenghi. Also they have some other lovely food to combine with hummus.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Fabulous food at great prices. Even for a meat eater, the vegan and vegetarian options are incredible - so much so that I don‚Äôt bother with the meat! Delicious, super cozy and friendly staff.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Perfect taste, big portions for a reasonable price. Absolutely worth to come here for a quick takeout or sit at the small but lovely tables. ...and the secret spicy sauce! ü•∞

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Very good place to have hummus bread. It provides option for vegan too. Special spicy sauce is also available. One of the best place for hummus bread in Amsterdam.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text:
Simply Delicious!
Their hummus is smooth and creamy, combined with nice simple toppings and the irresistible bonbon truly honors it's name: great as desertüòÉ
Also, you're served by very friendly staff.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: If you're a fan of hummus, and you want to taste it homemade, this is the place for you. ‚Ä¶

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Good humus. I get a medium size bowl and was full. Maybe the fact that there were no unlimited amount of pitta is a bit of a bummer and also no alcohol :( ‚Ä¶

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Everytime when we are in the Netherlands, we always try to drop by Sir Hummus as their Hummus is just fantastic. Went there last friday and again it was delicious. Go in the evening as the place wasn't crowded at all unlike lunch time when it is often packed.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Simply the best hummus this side of the Middle East. Really nice atmosphere in this small but cosy restaurant. The staff are so friendly and have all the time in the world for their customers. Great music playing in the background too.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: I love to go here for lunch, because they make delicious humus. Then after I ate there once I stay away for a couple of months, because in my experience there is only so much humus you can eat (even if it's really good).

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: This place was amazing! I got the regular vegan heaven hummus and the flavors were great. I have never had hummus warm, and this being my first hummus outside of the grocery store ones put me in shock at how good hummus can really be. It ‚Ä¶

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: This place is awesome!! One of the best hummus-es I tried so far. Great atmosphere with friendly staff. We had one hummus with beef and one with eggplant; both were great. Everything is freshly served!

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: As an avid hummus eater & maker I can definitely conclude this is the Best home made hummus in the Netherlands, no doubts! ‚Ä¶

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Delicious hummus with plenty of sides and toppings to choose from. Thick and fluffy pita. Also the spicy sauce they make is a good addition if you like it hot. Friendly staff and nice atmosphere. Whenever I'm in Amsterdam I go here!

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: One of the best Falafel in Amsterdam, so fresh and tastyüòã with the original taste of Middle Eastern cousin. I've ordered Hummus plate with Falafel it was amazing

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Good home made hummus! Have grown up in the Middle East on hummus and while this didn't hit the nostalgia fibres it was close to what I would call hummus (not the dip in your grocery store). The topping options, fresh pita bread and pickels ‚Ä¶

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text:
Hummus 5/5
Selection on menu  3/5
Prices 5/5 ‚Ä¶

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Simply great. The texture of the Hummus is fantastic, you feel like home from the first to your last second and the stuff is so nice. Thank you for a great Hummus experience. I'll be back for another round for sure.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: The Hummus was the best part about my Amsterdam trip, I loved it so much I kept coming back again and again. Healthy, pleasant, fairly priced, quick and friendly. ‚Ä¶

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: The best hummus place in Amsterdam. Located in a nice corner in one of the most beautiful neighborhood in Amsterdam. This place is small but you will always have place. The hummus here is very good fresh and tasty. The atmosphere is perfect ‚Ä¶

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: When my wife ordered vegan takeout for out anniversary I was like, whaaa? But then I tried the food and it was awesome. Truly. I had some roll with crispy aubergine in it, I think. And the hummus is addicting. So smooth and hearty. I want some now!

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: One of the best hummus i have had and some very tender beef, tasted great and the staff was nice and friendly and it's well worth the trip there :-)

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: The staff was super friendly and happy to see us. The food well presented, but it lacked flavors a bit. We chose a meat based dish and there was very little of it. I will give it another go, to see if it was just a one off.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: The very best!! The people who served us were amazingly nice, super relaxed and chill. The food was incredible. Fresh made hummus and the pita bread oh myyyy. If you love Israeli food, you MUST go here.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Very chilled out place with great hummus! Really enjoyed the place and would go back for sure

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: It was my third time here and it was still amazing hummus. So delicious ! I am definitely coming back and hopefully soon !

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: It's getting tastier each time I visit! This could very well be the best hummus I've ever eaten.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Excellent hummus with various different toppings, a little spicy salad portion and various sizes. The pita is yummy too. Service very friendly.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Liked the hummus and the spicy sauce - sides werent really the greatest and more pita by default would be much appreciated. Staff is very friendly though and the place has a unique feeling to it

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: No hesitation. Hands down the best hummus ever plus super friendly staff.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text:
Simply the best hummus in Amsterdam. And much more.
Especially love the irresistible bonbons.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: A very kind person taking our order, the food super fresh and beautiful and tasty. Even the drinks were very good!

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: One of the best places for hummus around. Top recommendation for something quick

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Best hummus I have eaten in the Netherlands! Not a lot of choice since they focus on perfecting their hummus, which makes it very special!

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Amazing hummus and pita üòç Great service and kind stuff. I will be back for sure!

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: If you want real Middle Eastern hummus, this is your place. Amazing food with friendly staff.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: I came here for lunch and loved everything about Sir Hummus. Such a cool little place, great service, great food, great drinks and great vibe.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Really wanted to give this full marks as I love hummus and is a unique shop. However, I ordered the 'starving' original meal. I was asked if I wanted pittas warmed up as it was obvious I was quite cold and I said YES and thanked them. What ‚Ä¶

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text:
High quality Hummus with very kind stuff in a wonderful environment.
Definitely will come again.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Fantastic place with great hummus and drinks! The best thing is the service - sooo friendly! Definitely coming back just for that :D

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Good and tasty food, service was reasonable however the decor is a bit hipster/cheap looking.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Best hummus in Amsterdam. In fact, best I've had outside of Israel. The pitas are very good as well. Strongly recommended!!

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: The service and atmosphere was nice. The servings are particularly big so if you're not hungry please just go for the small as hummus and bread is definitely filling! The hummus itself is nice but I would prefer the hummus to be room ‚Ä¶

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Nice place, love the idea of serving hummus with sides. We went for a lunch on a Friday and it was not too busy at the time, so managed to enjoy the food. The toppings are great and all - but I also agree hummus needed some more acid and salt. Please put some lemon juice at the tables :)

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Best hummus in Amsterdam! The vibe is perfect and cozy, sharing tables and trays. The small is plenty although we usually need more pita. Try all the spicy sauces if you like some heat :) In lieu of your uncles amazing hummus, this is the best.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: I just don't get the hype about sitting down to eat hummus. To me hummus is just a topping or something to make my carrots go jolly. If you are a hummus enthusiast and you want to try a restaurant just on hummus and friends, I guess you are ‚Ä¶

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: The short menu is in the spirit of "Do one thing, do it well." Best or tied for best hummus in Amsterdam. Just think best. Simple dining room, but it's laid back-hip. Very kind staff.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: We love good hummus since we went many times to Israel, and this is the place to go for great hummus in Amsterdam. This place makes you feel like you in Tel Aviv, enjoying great hummus in a friendly environment. We go at least 10 times a year.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text:
Great hummus, great toppings, and friendly staff!

The hummus is very mild, which fits well with the flavorful toppings and sauces. The limonana I ordered was very nice, too. Overall a very authentic Israeli lunch.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Very creamy hummus but be warned it‚Äôs on the bland side (original flavour and all that) so you might want some salt on the side. The toppings are nice and flavoursome but very small portions. Decent lunch place though will be around 10-12 euros/person.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Been eating hummus here regularly since the opening and recently visited Israel, the land of hummus. Ate so much hummus over there and visited the best places that I can say that the hummus here is comparable with one of the best hummus I ‚Ä¶

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text:
I was there yesterday with my girlfriend for the first time, and we were very happy with our decision to visit.
We both love hummus, and alternate between making our own and buying from the ‚Ä¶

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: One of the best hummus places I've been to. Super rich in taste but still light; delicious homemade lemonade and slow cooked pulled  beef for your hummus as topping. Reasonable prices and very nice service as well!

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Extremely delicious choice for vegetarian food. Enjoyed all the tastes. Small place... Suitable for 6 person sit. You can take your good away too. Strongly recommend it!

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text:
Perfect for a casual eating experience, light, filling, and moderately priced.
The homemade lemonade is the bomb.
Not many places make good lemonades, but they do. ‚Ä¶

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Friendly staff. yummy hummous. The pita is fluffy  warm goodness. Very filling. We tried 4 different combinations and they were all good but very similar. our favorite was by far with the eggplant. We all agreed on that. When in doubt i would order less not more as it is so filling. Extra bread instead. Kids liked it too.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Best hummus ever! So creamy and tasty! With the warm chickpeas on top... Delicious! I took it with grilled aubergine topping and loved it! Take a ginger beer with it ;)

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text:
Nice spot on the cozy but also bit more quiet square in this overall busy city district.
Serves like the name hints mainly hummus. Concept is simple: select portions ‚Ä¶

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: My first-place in 'best hummus places outside of Israel'! You know it's good when you see the tahini lined up by the counter... and the pita and chocolate babka is phenomenal as well. Modestly priced. Go - you won't regret it!

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text:
Good quality hummus, tasty and smooth. Well served, helpful staff. The only vegetables available to eat with the hummus are cucumber, tomato and onion which I don't like and there was no other alternative.
Great bread  as well, decent coffee.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Certainly one of the best places to get hummus with pickles and pita bread. The hummus is warm and very creamy, there are also freshly made cool drinks and definitely try the chili sauces!

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Amazing hummus place. Friendly staff, delicious dishes... and those sauces! They have home made lemonade and some ingredients available for shopping so you can cook your own hummus at home.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: An awesome hummus and a great variety of vegetables you can choose from, all very flavory. I appreciated the fact that there are meat options in the menu. The "lemonana" is an incredibly refreshing drink with a mix of flavors we tried to ‚Ä¶

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Closest to the real deal I tasted in The Netherlands

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Best hummus in the city. Absolutely a must to take pickled assortie and warm pita.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: yep, google reviews don't lie. Sir Hummus is worth of its stars. It won't be an exaggeration if I say that was the best hummus I've had so far. Hip area, friendly staff and big tables. Love it!

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: This is good hummus and the pickled vegetables are great!  But is it GREAT hummus?  No.  It could use a bit more acid and flavor.  I think you can get a better spread at the Albert Cupys market.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text:
Wonderful hummus!
Probably the best you can find in Amsterdam, much better than what you get at the Hummus kampioen or La sud. ‚Ä¶

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Absolutely delicious hummus and very kind staff. One of the better meals I had throughout my staff in Amsterdam. Would highly recommend this place to any hummus lover.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Best hummus in town! If you happen to be in De Pijp, you have to stop by: delicious, warm hummus, always served with an even warmer smile :) Been there plenty of times, never got disappointed. Oh, and they do take-away too!

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Hummus based plates. Healthy dishes and very friendly service. The Regular size is quite a lot of food actually. The place could use more starters and a couple of beers.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: The friendliest staff! Thank you all, very welcoming environment. Delicious hummus too, I had the carnivore which I highly recommend. I'll be back again, thanks guys!

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: The best hummus place I have been to. Good options for vegetarians.  Their fresh orange juice is amazing too. Give this a try if u r in Amsterdam

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: We had the Carnivora. It was absolutely amazing. The pita is warm and soft, the hummus was smooth and delicious, the beef was tender. To die for, must try!

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text:
Probably the best hummus I've had.

Ever. ‚Ä¶

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Delicious and authentic Middle Eastern hummus bar. The hummus is super creamy and all the ingredients are very fresh. Great place to stop for a quick lunch.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: The food is OK, but they don't have much options, it really depends on if you like hummus and falafel, cause urs the only plate they have there, or at least the inky vegetarian one, the ser2us pretty fast but the place is very small and has only three small tables, so it really depends on what you like.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Love, love, love this place!! Hands down the best hummus anywhere! Vegan or omnivore you cannot visit Amsterdam without stopping here. You will thank me when you do!

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: End up here randomly and I liked it very much!

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Delicious. Got small bowl of Complete hummus with egg & lemonade. Cost 15‚Ç¨ but the hummus is perfect

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Tasty but very expensive for hummus. Best in Amsterdam but similar quality in Tel-Aviv is 1/4th price.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Really good, healthy food for a decent price. Staff are welcoming and kind, but note that portions are extremely filling (but so delicious). They also sell small goods such as tahini and pita etc. Cannot recommend enough!

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: A very good hummus! Tastes exactly like home (: Also very nice environment, good music and friendly service. Will definetily come back here

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: There are some places that cannot be properly explained using written words. Sir Hummus is possibly one of those. All you really need to do is submit to the warm welcome and delicious nourishment you will receive here. The rest will take care of itself.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text:
Sir Hummus is a bastion of great middle eastern brunches.
The homemade hummus is excellently tasty, and if you crave meat there is something for you too. Also, please do yourself a favour and try the magic egg!

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Best hummus we ever had! The pita was delicious. Fluffy and hot. Salty pickles were a great addition. Definitely recommend.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: I have been coming here regularly since moving to Amsterdam and honestly AMAZING food- fresh, delicious and healthy! It‚Äôs also super affordable and the staff are always so friendly! My favourite hidden gem in town üåª

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Top notch hummus in Amsterdam! The staff is super friendly. You can eat in, or take to go. Seating inside is a bit limited, but there are benches you can sit on to eat, and a standing table at the front window.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Food is good but service is below the standard in rush hours: they simply forgot about my order. All people behind me already got a food and I was just ignored... thank you for such a great attention! Before I visited this place relatively often but I don't think that I will do it again.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Perfeft place for a quick lunch. Happy staff and good variations of food. I will be back for the meat one and please put extra bed with the hummus or ask people how much they want

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Really good, healthy food for a decent price. Staff are welcoming and kind, but note that portions are extremely filling (but so delicious). They also sell small goods such as tahini and pita etc. Cannot recommend enough!

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Absolutely delicious hummus and very kind staff. One of the better meals I had throughout my staff in Amsterdam. Would highly recommend this place to any hummus lover.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Best place in Europe to get real humus dish, search no more!

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: We love good hummus since we went many times to Israel, and this is the place to go for great hummus in Amsterdam. This place makes you feel like you in Tel Aviv, enjoying great hummus in a friendly environment. We go at least 10 times a year.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Food and service was amazing. And the homemade lemonade was really tasty. We loved it. <3

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Lovely place for hummus. Vegan heaven must try

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text:
Great hummus, great toppings, and friendly staff!

The hummus is very mild, which fits well with the flavorful toppings and sauces. The limonana I ordered was very nice, too. Overall a very authentic Israeli lunch.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: There are some places that cannot be properly explained using written words. Sir Hummus is possibly one of those. All you really need to do is submit to the warm welcome and delicious nourishment you will receive here. The rest will take care of itself.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Loved the food here. Amazing options for vegetarians. Pita bread was one of the best ones I have ever had. I got aubergine topping which was delicious.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text:
Great hummus restaurant, as a native middle eastern this place serve one of the best hummus I ever had.
Don't miss trying Labneh too!

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Quite possibly the BEST Hummus in the WORLD ‚ù£Ô∏è‚ù£Ô∏è

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Perfeft place for a quick lunch. Happy staff and good variations of food. I will be back for the meat one and please put extra bed with the hummus or ask people how much they want

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Sir Hummus stands out from the crowd because of their ‚Äòcrap-free policy‚Äô. If you thought hummus from your local supermarket was good, you should really head over to Van der Helstplein to check out this healthy hotspot for yourself.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Best hummus of my life

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Best Hummus ever, never had any hummus better than this and location is in a charming quiet neighborhood of Amsterdam, pity I did not click any photos while their.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Great place for lunch. Far from the madding crowd. It takes hummus to a new level for the uninitated. The staff are extremely friendly and the food and decor are perfect down the smallest detail.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: I've only ever eaten there once, but have regularly ordered from them using Deliveroo. They have simple, healthy and delicious food. I can't recommend them enough.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Good food. Make sure to order extra pita. However the hummus does get a bit sloppy towards the end and there is not much dining space.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Loved the hummus. It does not get fresher than this in Holland. The pita bread is an absolute winner.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: The last time I had hummus this good it was in Israel. Will definitely be making this place my regular!

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Yes! Although they no longer make my favourite Sabih, they still do top notch hummus bowls. Super friendly staff too.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Food is good but service is below the standard in rush hours: they simply forgot about my order. All people behind me already got a food and I was just ignored... thank you for such a great attention! Before I visited this place relatively often but I don't think that I will do it again.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Authentic hummus, very friendly staff and a cozy place. Lovely to get lunch or dinner here. Very vegan friendly.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Delicious hummus, nice waiters. Low cost, high ingredients quality.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Tasty hummus with authentic design! The only improvement could be adding more sassamy paste to the hummus.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Amazing experience that was real hummus !! Very creamy and tasty. The place also has a nice atmosphere

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: They do a great job with houmous. They sometimes do an eggplant special which is delicious. Otherwise go for the beef with a side of egg if you are feeling hungry.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Good variety of hummus based dishes which are very tasty. Portions are fair, but price is a little above what I'd expect.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: To make humus the exact amount of creamy and dense, is a lost artform. Luckily for us, Sir humus employs a few of remanant artisan! Yay!

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: One of the top places for quality hummus. Also great atmosphere and happy friendly staff.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Loved the hummus. Good portions and generous wirh the toppings.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: I ate here twice, on my short stay in Amsterdam and was super happy with both of my orders! If I lived here, I‚Äôd be here all the time! Sooo goood!

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Incredible Hummus. I‚Äôm from Israel and am stoked I found hummus that reminds me of home.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: The best hummus in Amsterdam! The ambiance is very cosy and relax, and the personnel is fantastic. It's a must visit!

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Hummus was nice, although not quite worth the hype over this place... Get the set, as it comes with some lovely pickles and salad.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Such a satisfying lunch spot. Highly recommend the hummus with beef. And have it with their special homemade spicy green sauce!

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Great little place with some real delicious food. Need a better bread to hummus ratio so just ask for extra bread and enjoy!

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Great hummus! Relatively light and airy, gently and well seasoned. Highly recommended!

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: amazing food and excellent service! we were here without a reservation and immediately got a table! very very nice and polite people working there, quick in service!! definitely recommend..

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Best hummus i've eaten in the Netherlands. Place is nice and cozy. Could go there every day.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Delicious food, Good quality price, the staff is very friendly and helpful. However, you have to wait a while for a table and you are implicitly pressured to eat and leave as soon as you are done. (Not a place where you take your time and enjoy)

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: We have been coming ever since they opened. Yummy humus, lovely people, best coffee in the area. Love this cute place.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Very good hummus. Great service! Perfect place. No airs or superficial thoughts. Very genuine and honest vibe.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Amazing food and amazing service. Also good price!

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Divine. This place has got me hooked on hummus! The combination of hummus and spicy aubergine is my favorite. Echt, goddelijk.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Hands down, best hummus I ever had. Absolutely creamy and delicious.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Despite the rave reviews I thought everything here was fine but unexceptional: the hummus, the bread, the ful, the chocolate tahini triangles ‚Äì everything

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Real Israli Hummus.  Reasonably priced and delicious. There are very few places to sit so you might have to wait a bit, especially on Sundays.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Good hummus, served with pickled vegetables and optional toppings. Laid back vibe, nice atmosphere.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Been buying hummus from here for more than a year now. Hands down the best place for hummus in Amsterdam.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Great Hummus made by Israelis. Very tasty and the price is not too high. Will be back for sure.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Delicious hummus and pita bread, and very good value for money!

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Amazing hummus in Amsterdam. It is cheap good and beautiful.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Nice humus, really Nice to eat and share with you Friends!

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text:
Great hummus, lovely staff
Only cards accepted
Very good and friendly environment

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Lovely place for hummus. Vegan heaven must try

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Best hummus that I have tried in town. Very friendly staff and relaxed atmosphere for lunch.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text:
Good Hummus, although a bit expensive.
The place is quite small, and there was not enough place to seat.
The staff was great and helpful.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: I really in love with this place. The staff were great and also friendly. I would be more happy if it was normal beef instead of pulled one:)

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: What's there to say, best hummus in Amsterdam, served the way you should eat it.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: In my opinion the best hummus in Amsterdam. It is worth going away from peak times in general!

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Best hummus ever! The eggplants on top is delicious... üëåüèª

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: I used to like this places when it first opened up. With time, it got busier, portions got smaller, prices went up, stopped making sense. There are better options out there now.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text:
Hummus as it should be... warm, rich, creamy, earthy.  If you have never tasted real
Hummus you must try it.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Best place in Europe to get real humus dish, search no more!

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Excellent food. The best hummus I've ever had.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Excellent hummus, a bit crowded but that's to be expected, consider takeaway

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: The best hummus in town, no doubts about it! Comfy place and outstanding service!

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Really delicious humus, best of the neighborhood no doubt. Take an egg and 2 pitas and munch like there's no tomorrow!

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: A must go for hummus lovers. Very reasonably priced for Dutch standards, and located in the beautiful Pijp area.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Very good place for hummus; comes with various toppings.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: One of my absolute favorite places in Amsterdam. Delicious hummus, nice people, delicious secret sauce.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Lovely people good hummus(use the sauces for extra spiciness) and toppings üíô

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Best hummus in town

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Delicious hummus with amazing toppings and pitta. Very relaxed atmosphere

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Amazing!!! Will be visiting here A LOT! Best place in Amsterdam for Hummus! The guys are so friendly as well!

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Super good! Great value for money balance! Perfect for a quick and healthy lunch. The staff is very friendly.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Excellent hummus and great atmosphere. Loved it!

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Just absolutely incredible  Just spent some time in Lebanon and the local hummus can't touch this place.

Name: Sir Hummus
Review Text: Amazing food, lovely staff, cool atmosphere. Best hummus in Holland

Name: Sir Hummus
